it's a said speak more slowly one guy said speak faster number of people said you should breathe differently one acupuncturist said he could cure me a hypnotist said that too but nothing helped me until I got to this place the communications Research Institute in Roanoke Virginia The Institute teaches people to become aware of exactly how we should produce speech there are vocal cords in the throat air from the lungs vibrates them smoothly to produce voice but
when a stutterer blocks the vocal cords tense and lockup

you can see it watching speech on an oscilloscope normal speech looks about like this each sound begins gently a stutterer speech even when we're not blocking begins more abruptly the treatment here is what psychologists call behavior modification simply re teach people how to speak without the abrupt starts to do that they slowed us down to two seconds per syllable three
